title: Composite API
summary: Compose multiple domain responses into a single API tailored for a channel or partner.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Partners and UIs often need a unified view; naive solutions create chatty clients or tight coupling.
whenToUse: You need a stable external contract
whenNotToUse: One domain owns all necessary data and behavior

thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Keep business rules in domains; composite API focuses on shaping and composing data.

complexity.rationale: Moderate complexity; operational demands can be high at scale.
complexity.operationalDemand: Moderateâ€”needs tracing, caching, and rate limiting.

realWorldExample.approach: Built a composite endpoint for quote and policy summary.
